cases.sql: insert into epvsl(vslid, vslnamecn, vslname, impvoy, berpln, port, flag, canceled) values('%s', '%s', '%s', '%s', '%s', '%s', %s, %s)
update epvsl set expvoy='%s', unberpln='%s', flag=2 where vslname='%s' and flag=1
update epvsl set flag=2, canceled=3 where vslname='%s' and flag=1 and canceled=9
